title: Ep 101: Meet the Husbands with Matt Mira and Anthony King
itunes:title: Ep 101: Meet the Husbands with Matt Mira and Anthony King
itunes:subtitle: This week Doree discovers Yoga Toes and inspires a conversation about foot care, and Kate shares an embarrassing story from vacation that involves flashing strangers (by accident). Then they welcome their husbands, Matt Mira and Anthony King, to the sh...
description:
This week Doree discovers Yoga Toes and inspires a conversation about foot care, and Kate shares an embarrassing story from vacation that involves flashing strangers (by accident). Then they welcome their husbands, Matt Mira and Anthony King, to the show. They discuss their face-washing routines, work burnout, panic attacks, and dealing with hair loss. Plus, they try to figure out what Pixi Glow Tonic is. (Spoiler alert: They don’t know.)


To leave a voicemail, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com. Follow us on Twitter and Instagram and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums).


This episode is sponsored by: 

 

- Conair - To buy the InfinitiPRO by Conair Texture Styling Hair Dryer, go to Conair.com and search for Textured Hair.

- Essie - To learn more about Essie Expressie check out essie.com.

- StitchFix - Get started today at stitchfix.com/forever35 and you'll get an extra 25% off when you keep all items in your box. 

- ThirdLove - Get 15% off your first purchase when you go to thirdlove.com/forever.

- StoryWorth - For $20 off, visit storyworth.com/forever35.

- Native - For 20% off your first purchase just visit nativedeodorant.com and use promo code FOREVER35 at checkout.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
